issue.title: Even more feature-test macros for fully freestanding features are not marked freestanding

discussion.p:
During the review of LWG it was noticed that the proposed resolution did not include a change to `__cpp_lib_ranges_indices`, which was added in Sofia by (which was after the issue was opened).
It also doesn't change `__cpp_lib_constexpr_utility`, and probably should do.
It doesn't change `__cpp_lib_tuple_like`, but that's less clear whether it should do. The relevant changes in <tuple> and <pair> are obviously available in a freestanding implementation, but the changes in <map> and <unordered_map> are not.
Set priority to 2 after reflector poll.
